order by $orderByClause$
select id, date_str, leader_count, member_count, powder_count, leader_sum, member_sum, powder_sum, create_dt from tj_member_leader_add_count where id = #id:BIGINT#

select LAST_INSERT_ID()

sqlMap.update:
update tj_member_leader_add_count
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
date_str = #record.dateStr:VARCHAR#
leader_count = #record.leaderCount:INTEGER#
member_count = #record.memberCount:INTEGER#
powder_count = #record.powderCount:INTEGER#
leader_sum = #record.leaderSum:INTEGER#
member_sum = #record.memberSum:INTEGER#
powder_sum = #record.powderSum:INTEGER#
create_dt = #record.createDt:TIMESTAMP#

update tj_member_leader_add_count set id = #record.id:BIGINT#, date_str = #record.dateStr:VARCHAR#, leader_count = #record.leaderCount:INTEGER#, member_count = #record.memberCount:INTEGER#, powder_count = #record.powderCount:INTEGER#, leader_sum = #record.leaderSum:INTEGER#, member_sum = #record.memberSum:INTEGER#, powder_sum = #record.powderSum:INTEGER#, create_dt = #record.createDt:TIMESTAMP#

update tj_member_leader_add_count
date_str = #dateStr:VARCHAR#
leader_count = #leaderCount:INTEGER#
member_count = #memberCount:INTEGER#
powder_count = #powderCount:INTEGER#
leader_sum = #leaderSum:INTEGER#
member_sum = #memberSum:INTEGER#
powder_sum = #powderSum:INTEGER#
create_dt = #createDt:TIMESTAMP#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update tj_member_leader_add_count set date_str = #dateStr:VARCHAR#, leader_count = #leaderCount:INTEGER#, member_count = #memberCount:INTEGER#, powder_count = #powderCount:INTEGER#, leader_sum = #leaderSum:INTEGER#, member_sum = #memberSum:INTEGER#, powder_sum = #powderSum:INTEGER#, create_dt = #createDt:TIMESTAMP# where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
select id, date_str, leader_count, member_count, powder_count, leader_sum, member_sum, powder_sum, create_dt from tj_member_leader_add_count
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$
select mlgb.* FROM tj_member_leader_add_count mlgb WHERE 1=1 AND mlgb.date_str <=#yesterday# AND mlgb.date_str >=#halfMonth# GROUP BY mlgb.date_str
select mlgb.* FROM tj_member_leader_add_count mlgb WHERE 1=1 AND mlgb.date_str <=#yesterday# AND mlgb.date_str >=#halfMonth# GROUP BY mlgb.date_str order by mlgb.date_str desc

select mlgb.* FROM tj_member_leader_add_count mlgb WHERE 1=1 AND mlgb.date_str <=#yesterday# AND mlgb.date_str >=#halfMonth# GROUP BY mlgb.date_str order by mlgb.date_str desc LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$
select count(1) from ( select mlgb.id FROM tj_member_leader_add_count mlgb WHERE 1=1 AND mlgb.date_str <=#yesterday# AND mlgb.date_str >=#halfMonth# GROUP BY mlgb.date_str )A

SELECT count(1) AS powderCount,DATE_FORMAT(tm.register_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date_str FROM t_member_leader tml LEFT JOIN t_member tm ON tm.id=tml.member_id LEFT JOIN t_leader tl ON tl.id=tml.leader_id WHERE tl.phone=#mobile# AND DATE_FORMAT(tm.register_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #halfMonth# AND DATE_FORMAT(tm.register_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #yesterday# GROUP BY date_str
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str,'%Y-%m-%d') AS data_str FROM t_date_base tdb WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#halfMonth# AND DATE_FORMAT(tdb.date_str,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#yesterday#
